overview: Made by the Department of Immigration to entice immigrants from Great Britain, this film shows an idyllic picture of life in the South Australian regional town of Mount Gambier in the mid 1960s.

production_companies.name: National Film and Sound Archive of Australia (NFSA)

tagline: A picture of life of in the South Australian town of Mt. Gambier in the mid 1960s.
title: Life in Australia: Mount Gambier
